Legal_Issue: Well-founded fear of persecution, Internal Flight Alternative (IFA)
Credibility_Assessment: RPD found applicants' evidence not credible or insufficient
Basis_of_Claim: Political opinion, fear of persecution due to political activities
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of evidence supporting threats outside home region, feasibility of IFA
Application_Error: Failure to establish well-founded fear of persecution, failure to rebut IFA
Review_Outcome: No error found in RPD's decision
Legal_Standard: Well-founded fear of persecution, reasonableness of relocation
Application_Factor: Geographic scope of risk, personal circumstances of claimants
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in credibility assessment and IFA finding
Cause_of_Refusal: No well-founded fear of persecution, availability of IFA
Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence of risk in proposed internal flight location (Chittagong)
Credibility_Issues: Applicants' claims deemed not credible due to lack of supporting evidence
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RPD's credibility and IFA findings
Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Procedural_Issue: Standard of review on judicial review
Omission_Type: Failure to provide sufficient evidence on conditions in alternative destination
